history.proof: hauto use: Nat.lt_irrefl unfold: list_injective, nat_sorted.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : nat lll : list nat IH : nat_sorted lll -> list_injective lll H : nat_sorted (x :: lll) Hx : In x lll Unable to unify "S ?M1419 <= x" with "False".

In environment H0 : forall (x y : nat) (ll : list nat), nat_sorted (x :: y :: ll) -> x < y x : nat lll : list nat IH : nat_sorted lll -> list_injective lll H : nat_sorted (x :: lll) Hx : In x lll Unable to unify "nat_sorted (x :: lll)" with "False".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: induction ll as [|x lll IH]. - intros _. apply in_list_injective_0. - intros H. apply in_list_injective_1. + intros Hx. apply nat_sorted_head_inv with (y := x) (ll := lll). apply H. + apply IH. eapply nat_sorted_cons_inv. apply H.
